entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
